description:
The Lawrence Law Firm, based in Kissimmee, Florida, is a respected personal injury and Social Security Disability law firm with a proven record of success. We devote our practice to assisting the victims of serious injury and long-term disability in their pursuit of justice, fair treatment and adequate compensation for their losses.

Our lead attorney, Chad Lawrence, is a former insurance defense attorney and adjudicator with the Social Security Administration. He has seen both hands of serious injury and disability matters, which gives our firm a thorough, informed perspective when helping you pursue your goals.

Hard Work, Dedication And A Commitment To Excellence

Whether you have been injured by someone else's negligence, hurt on the job or denied a fair decision on your Social Security claim, we are here to help. We know that each case is unique, so every client gets our undivided attention and individualized tactics. Our lawyers, paralegals, investigators and experts all play a crucial role in developing the strongest possible case on your behalf. We will investigate the facts of your case, determine who was responsible, and explore all possible avenues for compensation to maximize your chances of success.

We offer a free initial consultation so there is no risk in discussing your case with a knowledgeable personal injury attorney. Please visit our website or contact us directly to learn more about how we can help you.
